mapper.select:
select num,writer,subject,reg_date,readcount ,filename,filesize,down,re_level ,(select count(*) from chanboard_comment where board_num=num) comment_count, show from board_chan
where ${search_option} like #{keyword} and show='y'
where ( writer like #{keyword} or subject like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} ) and show='y'
order by ref desc, re_step
mapper.insert: insert into board_chan (num,writer,subject,password,ref,re_step,re_level ,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from board_chan) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{password} ,(select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from board_chan) ,1,0,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.update: update board_chan set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select password from board_chan where num=#{num} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into chanboard_comment (comment_num,board_num,writer,content) values ((select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from chanboard_comment) , #{board_num}, #{writer}, #{content})

insert into board_chan (num,writer,subject,password,ref,re_step,re_level ,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from board_chan) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{password} ,#{ref},#{re_step},#{re_level} ,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.update: update board_chan set down=down+1 where num=#{num}
